name: rightscale_services_tools

vpc_nat/other_instance_id.display_name: Instance ID of other HA host
vpc_nat/other_instance_id.description: The instance ID of the host to monitor.

vpc_nat/other_route_id.display_name: VPC Route ID of VPC route
vpc_nat/other_route_id.description: The route ID of the VPC route where the other instance is associated.

vpc_nat/route_id.display_name: VPC Route ID of VPC Route Table
vpc_nat/route_id.description: The route ID of the VPC route where the other instance is associated.

recipes.rightscale_services_tools::vpc-nat: enables AWS VPC NAT Host ipforwarding and iptables
recipes.rightscale_services_tools::vpc-nat-ha: enables AWS VPC NAT HA with another NAT Host

long_description:
Description
===========
A collection of useful tools brought to you buy the RightScale Services Team, make sure and check libraries, definitions, resources, and providers. There will be tools in each of those. 

Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====
Recipes-
  vpc-nat:  Configures ip forwarding and iptables for AWS VPC NAT host

Definitions -
  gen_profile_script

Libraries - 
  has_connectivity(ip,port,proto = "tcp")

  check_connectivity(host,port,message,timeout=60)
